summary: Marvel & Hulu Ink Pact For ‘Howard The Duck’ Animated Series + More – TCA
body:
Marvel & Hulu Ink Pact For ‘Howard The Duck’ Animated Series + More – TCA

So next year can we get the Defenders back as well please? Most of the shows were on a creative upswing. I was legitimately hyped for a Fraction and Brubaker Iron Fist adaptation!!

summary: I’m still upset that Dark Phoenix was supposed to come out this week but now it’s in June. 😔 But that doesn’t lessen my hype and...
body: I’m still upset that Dark Phoenix was supposed to come out this week but now it’s in June. 😔 But that doesn’t lessen my hype and love for the movie.

body:
Captain marvel hate


Needs to stop. I’m so sick and tired of seeing hate for it everywhere. If you don’t like what you’ve seen from the trailers fine. Don’t bitch about it because you have nothing else in life to do. Get a fucking life and stop.

blog.name: hoperesideswithinthismess
blog.title: This New Problem I Call Joy
blog.description: My name (and not my favorite color) is Red. I'm a guy. This tumblr of mine is primarily for fannish things or esoteric amusements. Occasionally something serious or thought provoking might creep in, and that's fine by me. I like to think I'm a nice sort of bloke. I take people as they are. If you want to be friends, cool, let's be friends.

blog.name: waspwidow
blog.title: with great power comes no future
blog.description: i used to have nothing. and then i got this job...this family. and it made me better. and now they're gone, and i'm still trying to be better. - eliza, she/they.

tags: trash vampires make bad life decisions
summary:
senalishia
 replied to your post  “no, brain, we do not need to start writing an Avengers/Interview with...”
                   ...
body:
senalishia replied to your post “no, brain, we do not need to start writing an Avengers/Interview with…”
come on! lestat wants to join the avengers! it would be so much fun!!!

Both Lestat’s ego and Tony Stark’s ego have their own gravitational pull.

I get the feeling that if you put them on the same planet they’d tear the universe apart.

summary: 'Howard the Duck' Animated Series Set at Hulu as Part of Marvel Deal
title: 'Howard the Duck' Animated Series Set at Hulu as Part of Marvel Deal
excerpt: With its partnership with Netflix winding down, Marvel TV is taking its characters over to Hulu, signing a hefty deal for multiple animated series.

tags: might mess around and make an aesthetic
summary: Listen, Tony Stark is absolutely a king. He is the most kingly avenger by far and I’m including Thor (who I love don’t yell at...
body: Listen, Tony Stark is absolutely a king. He is the most kingly avenger by far and I’m including Thor (who I love don’t yell at me he’s a good boy). But you know what reaffirms that more than anything? The fact that, above all, Pepper is the queen.

reblog.comment: Listen, Tony Stark is absolutely a king. He is the most kingly avenger by far and I’m including Thor (who I love don’t yell at me he’s a good boy). But you know what reaffirms that more than anything? The fact that, above all, Pepper is the queen.

trail.content_raw: Listen, Tony Stark is absolutely a king. He is the most kingly avenger by far and I’m including Thor (who I love don’t yell at me he’s a good boy). But you know what reaffirms that more than anything? The fact that, above all, Pepper is the queen.
trail.content: Listen, Tony Stark is absolutely a king. He is the most kingly avenger by far and I’m including Thor (who I love don’t yell at me he’s a good boy). But you know what reaffirms that more than anything? The fact that, above all, Pepper is the queen.
